title: Integers instead of ocean passages names
description:
The "sector" dimensions is a list of integers (0 to 16). It must be replaced by the "sector" variable with the following list of the different ocean passage names:
- barents_opening
- bering_strait
- canadian_archipelago
- denmark_strait
- drake_passage
- english_channel
- pacific_equatorial_undercurrent
- faroe_scotland_channel
- florida_bahamas_strait
- fram_strait
- iceland_faroe_channel
- indonesian_throughflow
- mozambique_channel
- taiwan_luzon_straits
- windward_passage
- gibraltar_strait
